text:
Hey guys, a customer asked me to develop <https://pos.toasttab.com/resources/restaurant-pos-system-roi/app|this very exact> interactive form.

It seems that it's integrated with Marketo. However, I'm wondering if you believe that the form is custom made or if there's any off-the-shelves solution that I could use to build a similar UX to then integrate with HubSpot?
